name: Rohan
description: A smart home energy management system that uses AI to optimize electricity usage, reduce bills, and promote sustainability by integrating with renewable energy sources and real-time power consumption tracking.

name: Sohan Priyadarshi Sahoo
description: A personalized AI-driven wellness app offering tailored fitness plans, mental health support, and nutrition advice, integrating wearable data to optimize user health and simplify achieving holistic well-being goals.
